timeline.bodyText: shouldn't we handle the case when blockNumber is negative?
timeline.author: Vovchyk

timeline.bodyText: shouldn't we listen to onBestBlock event instead?
timeline.author: Vovchyk

replies.bodyText: We use onBlock only to take advantage of no of confirmations at the earliest time possible, in an independent way of being processing the next bestchain or not
replies.author: ajlopezrsk

timeline.bodyText: Seems dataSource field cannot be null (non-nullable)? It's being checked for null in a few places in this class. But in other places (e.g. in flush method) it is not.
timeline.author: Vovchyk

replies.bodyText: Done, I just added additional checks
replies.author: ajlopezrsk

timeline.bodyText: I guess here we could use HashMap instead of ConcurrentHashMap. Access to this filed is synchronized in this class.
timeline.author: Vovchyk

timeline.bodyText: Looks like this method is not thread-safe. Shouldn't it be synchronized?
timeline.author: Vovchyk

replies.bodyText: Currently only one thread at a time access this method, but yes, it could be fragile if new changes are added to the block processing logic (like processing blocks in multiple threads). So, done!
replies.author: ajlopezrsk

timeline.bodyText: blocksBloomInProcess field is not synchronized. And it looks like it's only needed for unit testing. Shouldn't the method be marked as synchronized or VisibleForTesting?
timeline.author: Vovchyk

timeline.bodyText: shouldn't we limit the size of this map?
timeline.author: Vovchyk

replies.bodyText:
Good. But I though it should be to refine in another tasks. The idea is to not be disruptive with the current behavior the main consumers of the logs have now (like Lumino and token bridge). And all this work (the new blooms) are optional, only to be adopted by power users.
Even with 2 millions of blocks, the used memory should be few megabytes.
replies.author: ajlopezrsk

timeline.bodyText:
Shouldn't be?
!this.empty && this.fromBlock <= blockNumber && blockNumber <= this.toBlock;
timeline.author: fedejinich
fedejinich

timeline.message: Bloom blocks configuration, service, synchronized store
Set default no of blocks to 64; logging messages
Rename BlocksBloomBuilder to BlocksBloomProcessor; rename setBlocksBloom method to addBlocksBloom; rename blocksBloom private variable to blocksBloomCache
Fix bug and refactor method BlocksBloomStore hasBlockNumber
Avoid processing negative block number; adding synchronization; adding visibility for testing; use HashMap instead of ConcurrentHashMap
Adding comments to classes and methods
Adding null checks to BlocksBloomStore dataSource
